Html:
Hello radioman,

Thanks for your product. This is great.

There is one problem regarding distance calculation i think.
I noticed you use haversine formula, http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html for it. But you use semi-major axis of ellipsoid as "Axis" parameter instead Earth average radius. This will give more precision on equatorial places, but more calculation error as distance from the equator. I think should be use R = 6371210 m. Or need use more complex calculations ( semi-major axis of ellipsoid, semi-minor axis of ellipsoid and calculate Earth radius for middle point between start point and end point).

Best regards.
